themes: importance of everyday access to art resources
key_phrases: ALL ARTISTS are at risk of displacement
Art organizations are very much at risk too
crucial to a healthy creative ecosystem
requires more than a few big annual art related events
need everyday access to gallery shows, art studios, education, resources, and community
barriers_identified: risk of displacement for artists and organizations
limited access to everyday art resources
overreliance on a few big annual events
solutions_proposed: provide everyday access to gallery shows, art studios, education, resources, and community
